description: This file is a build script for the WebconfigFramework component in a software project. It sets up environment variables, configures build options, and defines functions for configuring, cleaning, building, and installing the WebconfigFramework module.

methods.name: configure
methods.description: Configures the build environment for the WebconfigFramework component, running autotools commands and setting linker and compiler flags based on device model.

methods.name: clean
methods.description: Removes build artifacts and resets the build directory.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Compiles the WebconfigFramework source code and installs it.

methods.name: rebuild
methods.description: Performs a clean followed by configuration and build.

methods.name: install
methods.description: Copies header files, generates debug symbols for the shared library, and installs the library into the filesystem root.
